title.en: Koi da Ai da wa Sateoite

altTitles.ja: 恋だ愛だはさておいて

description.en: On the way home from work, Okazaki Taichi finds a man named Fuji sleeping on a bench one day. Okazaki brings Fuji to his house, and somehow ends up on top of him. They become friends with benefits. It's the start of an erotic BL between a heterosexual salaryman and a lewd bartender.

title.en: My God Is a Lustful Man

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Deus É Um Homem Lascivo

altTitles.en: My god is a desire maker

description.en:
Hye-sal, a timid ethics teacher who has lived her whole life without desires, finds that a neighbor who exudes desire and pleasure has moved in next door. With a sexy appearance and a fatal scent, his name is Dionysus, shortened to Dio.

When Dio makes divine wine, the essential ingredient required is the deep desires that humans have never fulfilled in their lifetime. The one who possesses that is Hye-sal! All she desires is her repetitive peaceful daily life, without any other dreams or desires.

Dio begins relentlessly pestering her, using even divine abilities to awaken the deep desires within Hye-sal.
description.pt-br: A reservada professora de ética, Jeon Haesul, levando uma vida sem muitas aspirações, inesperadamente se vê residindo ao lado de uma divindade do desejo e do prazer chamada ‘Dionísio’ ou simplesmente Dio, que exala uma fragrância cativante com uma aparência sedutora. O ingrediente essencial para a criação do vinho por Dio são os desejos profundos e não realizados que os indivíduos carregam ao longo de suas vidas, e Haesul os possui! Tudo o que ela deseja é a tranquilidade rotineira do dia a dia, tendo vivido sem quaisquer outros sonhos ou desejos. Dio, em seus esforços incansáveis ​​para despertar os desejos profundos de Haesul, emprega suas habilidades divinas, transformando a vida dela em uma fonte constante de aborrecimento.

altTitles.ja: 恋喰少女

description.en:
High school student Ooishi Kyou is afraid of women.

Suddenly, five girls confessed to him. Among them, four are creatures called Koibami - beings that devour human romantic feelings. If he has his romantic feelings eaten by these girls, he will never be able to love again.

However, he cannot abandon the feelings of the one who confessed to him for real - Kyou decides to find the one he truly loves among the five! A brain-shaking, romantic comedy suspense begins!
description.es-la: Oishi Kyou es un chico que siempre ha tenido un fuerte miedo a las chicas. Cuando comienza su primer día de clases en la preparatoria, se ve abrumado al recibir confesiones de amor por parte de cinco chicas diferentes. Sin embargo, descubre que cuatro de ellas son en realidad chicas ‘Devoradoras de Amor’, chicas que buscan seducir a los hombres para alimentarse de sus sentimientos, y sus presas favoritas son los sentimientos del ‘Primer Amor’, gracias a cierta persona el Protagonista sabe que 4 chicas de primer año son ‘Devoradoras de Amor’ así que, dentro de estas 5 chicas hay una que se confesó realmente a Oishi, así que se propone a encontrar a la única chica entre las 5 que realmente lo ama, todo sea antes de que devoren sus sentimientos.
description.pt-br:
O estudante do ensino médio, Kyo Oishi, tem medo de mulheres.
 
De repente, cinco garotas se declaram para ele. Entre elas, quatro são criaturas chamadas Devoradoras de Amor - seres que devoram sentimentos românticos humanos. Se ele tiver seus sentimentos românticos consumidos por essas garotas, ele nunca mais será capaz de amar novamente.
 
No entanto, ele não pode abandonar os sentimentos daquela que se declarou para ele de verdade - Kyo decide encontrar a única que realmente ama ele entre as cinco! Começa uma comédia romântica de suspense que balança o cérebro!

altTitles.es: El esclavo de la élite de soldados de Mato

altTitles.en: Slave of the Magic Capital's Elite Troops

altTitles.ja: 魔都精兵のスレイブ

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/takemura4hey/)
description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---
description.pt-br:
A dimensão cheia de demônios conhecida como "Mato" se abriu para ameaçar a humanidade, e uma espécie de "pessegueiro" que ali cresce produz frutos que conferem poderes especiais a quem os come, dando à humanidade uma chance de lutar, mas isso só funciona para mulheres. Como tal, como protetoras da humanidade, as mulheres ascendem no estatuto social, enquanto os homens são relegados a cidadãos de segunda classe, em busca de uma ocupação básica e de reconhecimento.

 Yuuki Wakura é um estudante do último ano do ensino médio, astuto e trabalhoso, cuja irmã mais velha foi raptada durante um evento em Mato, 5 anos antes; enquanto lamenta as dificuldades da vida que tem pela frente, um evento se abre diante dele, e ao ser resgatado dos demônios pela Capitã Kyouka do Corpo Anti-Demônio, ela confere a ele poderes como seu "escravo" e o transforma em uma poderosa montaria bestial. que destrói os demônios.

No entanto, há um preço surpreendente a pagar por ele ser seu “escravo”… e não é ele quem tem que pagar.

altTitles.ja: スライム聖女

altTitles.ja-ro: Slime Seijo

description.en: The weakest monster (slime) who longed to be human is reincarnated as a saint, but with the worst character of all, a villainous noble girl. From the lowest status, hated and resented; an existence where she will be terminated immediately if her true identity as a slime is discovered, she will become a beloved saint in order to live a safe and secure life!

altTitles.ja: アオのハコ

altTitles.ja-ro: Ao no Hako

description.en:
Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr:
Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Delcourt/Tonkam**
description.kk: Тайки Иномата - спортқа терең бағытталған Еймей орта және жоғары мектебінің бадминтон тобында ойнайды. Ол әр таң сайын мектеп спортзалында онымен бірге жаттығатын Чинацу Кано атты үздік баскетболшы сенпайға ғашық. Бір күні олардың қарым - қатынасы өзгеріске ұшырап, арасындағы қашықтық жойыла бастады... Осылай, көктемнің бір кезінде мектеп спорт залында тағы да бір махаббат, спорт және жастық шақ оқиғасы басталды.
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

title.en: I Look Too Much Like the Boss and the World Actually Believes It

altTitles.zh: 长的太像BOSS，结果世人真的信了

altTitles.zh-ro: Zhang De Tai Xiang BOSS, Jieguo Shiren Zhen De Xinle
Zhǎng De Tài Xiàng BOSS, Jiéguǒ Shìrén Zhēn De Xìnle

altTitles.en: The Appearance Is So BOSS-like, yet Everyone Believes It

description.en: Moon Lord, Suliang! Tamer of the Divine Lunar Morpho Butterfly, a familiar with abilities to control time and space, yin and yang, I am the invincible youth that stands at the apex of this world! To get such a status upon reincarnation is like getting dealt Pocket Aces… Divine my Arse! The beast in my body is nothing like the Divine Lunar Morpho! It’s clearly the lowest of low level Flash Butterfly!!! Facing millions of fanatical believers, a death match with Emperor Cangyue in three years time, and various sects viewing me as a thorn in their side… This is really an unprecedented beast tamer crisis!
description.zh: 月之王，苏凉！操纵着能回溯时空、逆转阴阳的月神闪蝶，以此站在这个世界的顶点的无敌少年！ 穿越而来就拿到这么NB的身份卡，岂不是天胡开局……个屁咧！ 我体内的宠兽，哪是什么月神闪蝶！！根本只是个只能照明的最最最低阶的闪光蝶！！！ 面对数以百万的狂热信徒、三年后约战的沧月大帝、视自己为眼中钉的各大教派…… 这还真是…… 前所未有的御兽大危机！

altTitles.ja: 僕と君が夫婦になるまで

description.en: Saku Kanakura was a boy born into a poor household. He studied hard and managed to pass the exam to an excellent high school but, it soon turned out that his parents were in debt! When it was time to pay the debt off, a mysterious gal appeared and offered to pay off their debt. A big burden was almost off Kanakura's head, but the gal made a condition in return which stated that—
description.id: Saku Kanakura adalah anak laki-laki yang lahir dari keluarga miskin. Dia belajar dengan giat dan berhasil lulus ujian ke sekolah menengah yang bagus, tetapi ternyata orang tuanya terlilit hutang! Ketika tiba waktunya untuk melunasi hutang, seorang gadis misterius muncul dan menawarkan untuk melunasi hutang mereka. Sebuah beban besar hampir terlepas dari kepala Kanakura, tetapi gadis itu membuat syarat sebagai balasannya yang menyatakan bahwa—
description.ja: 貧乏な家庭に育った少年・神長倉颯空。猛勉強の甲斐あって見事希望する高校へ合格した彼だったが、両親の借金が判明！ 借金を取り立てられていたところ、謎のギャルが現れてそれらを返済してくれることに！ 窮地を脱した神長倉だったが、ギャルが借金を肩代わりする際に彼に出した条件は――。

description.en:
The protagonist fell asleep while playing an online game. However, he awoke in a strange world with his game character's appearance. In a state of shock, he noticed that he was equipped with nothing but his strongest weapon and armor. To make matters worse, our hero's appearance was changed by the special avatar skin『Skeleton』when he enter this new world. The protagonist wanted to live without drawing attention, but he got acquainted with the dark elf Ariana and received her request.  
  
- [Official English Light Novel](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/skeleton-knight-in-another-world-light-novel/)
description.uk: Одного разу головний герой грав у відеогру, поки він не заснув...й коли він прокинувся, опинився в ігровому світі в образі свого аватара, як скелет! Оснащений потужною зброєю та обладунками аватара, але застрягши у страхітливій зовнішності, Арк повинен знайти місце для себе в цьому дивовижному світі. Усі його сподівання на тихе життя розвіюються, коли він зустрічається з прекрасною ельфійкою воїном, після чого вони разом подорожують цим світом.
description.pt-br:
Arc, um jovem jogador, desmaia durante uma partida online e quando desperta se depara em um mundo estranho, muito semelhante ao do jogo. Chocado com o ocorrido, ele percebe que está neste mundo munido de uma armadura e uma poderosa arma, além de poderes e aparência modificada para a de um [Caveiro]. Arc precisa se manter vivo e, para isso, não deve chamar a atenção. Porém, ele acaba encontrando uma elfa chamada Ariana e aceitando o seu pedido.

- [Original WebNovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6266ci/)

altTitles.ja: 乙女怪獣キャラメリゼ

description.en: Afflicted by a "mysterious illness," high school first year Kuroe has spent her entire life avoiding socializing with others. However, after coming into contact with Minami Arata, the most popular boy in school, something changes— and Kuroe's true powers are unleashed…

title.en: The Invincible Summoner Who Crawled up From Level 1

altTitles.ja: レベル1から始まる召喚無双~俺だけ使える裏ダンジョンで、全ての転生者をぶっちぎる

altTitles.ja-ro: Level 1 kara Hajimaru Shoukan Musou: Ore dake Tsukaeru Ura Dungeon de, Subete no Tenseisha o Bucchigiru

altTitles.en: Unrivaled Summoner Starts From Level 1: Destroy All the Reincarnated People in the Secret Dungeon That Only I Can Use

altTitles.pt-br: Invocador inigualável  começa no nível 1: Destrua todas os transmigradores na masmorra secreta que só eu posso usar

description.en:
After losing his father in a tragic accident, Shinobu Iijima and his younger sister Megumi are taken in by their father’s old friend, Ayumu.

Shinobu works hard in the hopes of starting a new life for himself. Megumi, and a mobile game called La Vita Online, are the only things keeping him afloat.

One day, Ayumu reveals his true intentions of tearing Shinobu down and getting his hands on Megumi. But just after Shinobu learns that Ayumu deleted all of his game data in La Vita, their high-rise apartment catches on fire and Shinobu falls to his death, Megumi in tow. He wakes up in a strange new world... and realizes he’s been reincarnated into the world of La Vita Online.

An announcement from the devs tells him that Ayumu is already there, and a countdown to Megumi’s arrival is ticking. Shinobu vows to protect Megumi after she arrives at any cost, even if it means he has to crawl his way up from level 1 to fend off all the other reincarnated players.
description.id:
Shinobu Iijima kehilangan nyawanya bersama adik perempuan,
 Ketika dia bangun, dia sudah bereinkarnasi di dunia game yang dia mainkan.
 Shinobu putus asa untuk memulai permainan dari awal setelah ayah angkatnya menghapus data gamenya, tetapi dia mengetahui bahwa adik perempuannya akan segera bereinkarnasi di dunia ini juga.
 Untuk menghentikan ayah angkatnya menjadi pemain top yang mengincar tubuh adik perempuannya, dia akan memulai jalan menuju yang paling menyakitkan ...!
description.pt-br: Depois de perder seu pai em um trágico acidente, Shinobu Iijima e sua irmã mais nova, Megumi, são acolhidos pelo velho amigo do seu pai, Ayumu.Shinobu trabalha duro na esperança de começar uma nova vida para si mesmo. Sua irmã Megumi e um jogo para celular chamado La Vita Online são as únicas coisas que o mantêm à tona.Um dia, Ayumu revela suas verdadeiras intenções de derrubar Shinobu e colocar as mãos em Megumi. Mas logo depois que Shinobu descobre que Ayumu excluiu todos os dados de seus jogos no La Vita, o apartamento deles no arranha-céu pega fogo e Shinobu cai para a morte, com Megumi a seu lado. Ele acorda em um mundo novo e estranho... e percebe que reencarnou no mundo do La Vita Online.Um anúncio dos desenvolvedores diz a ele que Ayumu já estão lá e que a contagem regressiva para a chegada de Megumi está correndo. Shinobu jura proteger Megumi depois que ela chegar a qualquer custo, mesmo que isso signifique que ele tenha que rastejar desde o nível 1 para se defender de todos os outros transmigradores.

title.en: Every cloud has a silver lining

altTitles.ja: 捨てる神あれば拾う神あり

description.en: Every end is a new beginning.

altTitles.ja: うさぎのふらふら

description.en:
Usagi and Maho are good friends.

They walk around Kichijoji, visit Akabane, do riddles in the bookstore district, play doctor in the park, and so on.

Cute things happen anytime, anywhere in this strange town!

A whimsical, whimsical, fluffy and fun location comic~!
description.ja: うさぎとまほ、ふたりの女の子が可愛らしくデフォルメされた「街」を舞台に、好きなことを好きなように！　気ままで気まぐれでふわふわ楽しいロケーションコミック♪

altTitles.ja: 君、弟を見なかったか?

description.en: The martial arts master Chu Wenshan has lost his memories, but the only clue to finding out about himself is a threatening letter… Huh? My brother was kidnapped? Wait, who’s my brother? No, even if I don’t know, I have to rescue him. Excuse me my friend, have you seen my brother?

altTitles.ja: 皇帝エンディングでいきます

altTitles.th: ทะลุมิติมาลุ้นรัก

description.en: Obsessed with medieval fantasies, Marina develops a revolutionary VR device that can bring fictional worlds to life. Her dreams come true when she transports herself to Lasnorok, the setting of her own novel. The problem is, she can't get back out! Disguised as a runaway slave boy named Rino, she comes face-to-face with the main character she created, the ambitious Edward Allen Dihas. Can Marina help him overthrow the emperor and survive to make it out alive?

altTitles.ja: The Comic Artist And His Assistants
マンガ家さんとアシスタントさんと

altTitles.ja-ro: Mangaka-san to Assistant-san to

description.en:
A Life Description about the Mangaka Aito Yuuki and his Assistant Ashisu Sahoto.  
Aito-san doesn't understand the feelings of the characters on his stories. So He asks Ashisu to help him. Ashisu would do everything for the work. She would even let him touch her breast so he will know how it feels like?!  
  
The Habit?! The Pervert?! Can we understand them? That's the Comedy of a Mangaka Life.

The mangaka alternates between the standard style and the 4koma.  

---

**Links:**  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=15793)
description.ru: Жизнь описание мангака Айто Юки и его помощницы Ашису Сахото. Айто-сан не понять чувства героев его рассказов. Поэтому он просит Ашису, чтобы помочь ему. Ашису сделает все для работы. Она бы даже даст пощупать ее собственной груди так он будет знать, как она чувствует, как?! Привычка?! Извращенце?! Мы можем их понять? Это комедия о мангака жизни.
description.pt-br: A história desse mangá descreve sobre a vida do mangaka Aito Yuuki e de sua assistente Ashisu Sahoto. Aito-san não entende os sentimentos dos personagens de suas histórias. Então ele pede para Ashisu ajudá-lo. Ashisu faria tudo pelo trabalho. Ela poderia até mesmo deixar ele tocar em seus próprios seios para que ele sinta como é.

title.ja: I Don't Know Which Is Love

altTitles.ja: どれが恋かがわからない

altTitles.id: Aku Nggak Tau Yang Mana Cinta

altTitles.ja-ro: Dore ga Koi Ka ga Wakaranai

description.en: Our protagonist, Soraike Mei, confessed her unrequited love to her friend at the high school graduation ceremony… That was the plan, at least. Her confession was a failure. Because of that, she is keen to “Definitely get a girlfriend during college!” But for some reason, one woman after another keeps on approaching her?!
description.id: Mei, seorang gadis yang pernah merasakan pahitnya cinta yang telah direbut oleh suatu cowok pada saat kelulusan SMA, mencoba berusaha untuk menggaet cewek di Universitas. Namun, dalam kehidupan di kampusnya, dia tidak hanya didekati oleh 1 cewek, tetapi 5 cewek! Apakah Mei dapat bertahan hidup karenanya?

altTitles.en: The Evil Empress Loves Me So Much!
Villain Empress Loves Me So Much!

description.en:
I somehow managed to be reincarnated as a maid who monopolized the Emperor’s affection. In the end, she was killed by the Evil Empress through vicious means.

‘Fortunately, I’m only five years old.’

‘I still have a long way to go before the original work begins, so shouldn’t I just avoid the Emperor and Empress until then?’

I thought so, but…

“Lize, what did you say to the Emperor?”

“I said that I support you.”

The evil Empress who was supposed to kill me in the original story won’t leave me alone.

“Truthfully, you like me much more than the Emperor, don’t you? Am I right?”

Is the Empress trying to win me over?

altTitles.ja: 犬の黒人男性

description.en:
Rex is a half man half dog. He was created when a drunk old man forced himself on a stray female dog in the street. 
Because of his father, Rex has to live his life as a freak rejected by society.
So one day he’s gonna find that man, and RAPE him.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [MANGA Plus Creators](https://medibang.com/mpc/titles/wt2208302035572710014241408/) | [ART street](https://medibang.com/book/xb2005061537310810014241408/) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/61917191/series/172665)
- Discord - [Server](https://discord.com/invite/BzQXA4vwXt)
description.fr: Rex est moitié humain et moitié chien. Il est né quand un vieux mec bourré a baisé une chienne errante dans le rue. À cause de son père, Rex doit vivre en étant rejeté par la société. Alors un jour… il va retrouver ce type, et le VIOLER
description.ru: Рекс - наполовину человек, наполовину собака. Он был создан, когда пьяный старик изнасиловал собаку на улице. Из-за отца Рекс вынужден жить как урод, отвергнутый обществом. Так что однажды... он найдет этого человека и отомстит ему.
description.uk: Рекс - напівлюдина напівсобака. Він був створений коли дуже п'яне чмо трахнуло вуличну собаку. Через нього він став потворою та ізгоєм. Тож одного дня... він знайде свого "татуся", і зґвалтує ЙОГО!
description.es-la: Rex es un híbrido mitad hombre, mitad perro. Fue creado cuando un viejo borracho abusó sexualmente de una perra callejera en la calle. Por culpa de su padre, Rex tiene que vivir su vida como un fenómeno, rechazado por la sociedad. Así que un día… encontrará a ese tipo y lo v*olará.

altTitles.ja: 彼女の友達

altTitles.ja-ro: Kanojo no Tomodachi

description.en: He got a cute girlfriend who was the first in his life, but her friend tempted him with a body that was lewder than her ... What would you do if your girlfriend's friend pressed you like this? A fascinating erotic story drawn by Jura from the popular doujin circle "JACK-POT".
description.ja: 人生で初めてできた、かわいい彼女。でもその友達は、彼女よりも豊満なカラダで僕を誘惑してきて…。彼女の友達にこんな風に迫られたら、あなたはどうしますか？ 大人気同人サークル「JACK-POT」のじゅらが描く、魅惑の背徳物語。

title.en: Rebirth in the End Times: I Reached the Top by Opening Boxes

altTitles.zh: 末世重生：我靠开箱子问鼎巅峰

description.en:
Jiang Xiaoyong was betrayed and killed by a green tea girl in the apocalypse, but was accidentally resurrected a year ago and obtained the blind box system. 

He was always one step ahead of others, collecting supplies and spending a fortune to build a safe house before the apocalypse. He became stronger through the system and avenged his enemies in his previous life. 

From then on, he embarked on the road to the king's counterattack.

Mu Shiba and Long Shuo — one hot-blooded and passionate, the other cold and distant. Despite their vastly different personalities, the two young men's paths cross and they set out on a journey to find the mysterious "Xiao"...
description.es: Mu Shiba y Long Shuo: uno ardiente y apasionado, el otro frío y distante. A pesar de sus personalidades tan diferentes, los caminos de los dos jóvenes se cruzan y emprenden un viaje para encontrar al misterioso «Xiao»...

description.en:
Do Do-Hee is the successor of the Future Group. She has an arrogant and cool-headed personality, who doesn’t trust in anyone and is cynical about love. Do Do-Hee gets involved with a demon named Jung Gu-Won and makes a contract marriage with him.

He can live for eternity by making dangerous, but sweet deals with humans who endure hellish lives. But after looking down upon humans for 200 years, he gets involved with Do Do-Hee and somehow loses his power. To prevent his own extinction, he must protect Do Do-Hee who has taken all of his power.

This is the webtoon version of the K-Drama with the same title which aired on Nov 24, 2023

title.en: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.ja: 時々ボソッとロシア語でデレる隣のアーリャさん

altTitles.ru: Аля, которая сидит рядом со мной, иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски
Аля-сан иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски

altTitles.vi: Arya-san bàn bên thi thoảng lại trêu ghẹo tôi bằng tiếng Nga

altTitles.zh-hk: 不時輕聲地以俄語遮羞的鄰座艾莉同學

altTitles.id: Alya-san Terkadang Menyembunyikan Perasaannya dalam Bahasa Rusia

altTitles.pt-br: Alya-san geralmente esconde seus sentimentos em russo

altTitles.ne: आल्या कहिलेकाहीँ रूसी भाषामा आफ्नो भावना लुकाउँछिन्

altTitles.de: Alya verbirgt manchmal ihre Gefühle auf Russisch

altTitles.en: Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian
My Deskmate Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian

altTitles.ja-ro: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.pl: Alya Czasami Ukrywa Swoje Uczucia Używając Rosyjskiego

altTitles.ja-ro: Roshidere

altTitles.mn: Аля Заримдаа Орос Хэлээр Сэтгэлээ Нуудаг

description.en:
"И на меня тоже обрати внимание..."

Alya, the incomparably beautiful silver-haired girl in the next seat over, occasionally mumbles to herself in Russian. She says she switches to it whenever she’s badmouthing me… but I know the truth! I know for a fact that she just said "Pay attention to me, too." to me! 

Masachika Kuze has native-level skills when it comes to Russian comprehension, but Alya has no idea about that... and that’s why she keeps on hiding those sweet feelings about him in her native language!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.mn:
Аля гэх, хэнтэй ч зүйрлэшгүй үзэсгэлэн, мөнгөлөг үстэй охин, заримдаа дотроо оросоор шивнэдэг. Тэр хэлэхдээ, намайг муулах үедээ л тэгдэг гэж хэлсэн...гэхдээ би орос хэл мэднэ! Саяхан "Надад анхаарал тавиач" гэж хэлэхийг нь би сонссон!

Масачика Күзэ орос хэлийг уугуул түвшний чадамжаар ойлгодог, гэвч Аля үүнийг мэдэхгүй...тийм болохоор өөрийнхөө сэтгэлийг орос хэлээр нуудаг!
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

title.en: Konbini Goutou kara Tasuketa Jimi Tenin ga, Onaji Kurasu no Ubu de Kawaii Gyaru datta

altTitles.ja: コンビニ強盗から助けた地味店員が、同じクラスのうぶで可愛いギャルだった

altTitles.ja-ro: Conveni Goutou Kara Tasuketa Jimi Tenin ga, Onaji Class no Ubu de Kawaii Gal datta

altTitles.en: The Sobbing Clerk I Helped From the Convenience Store’s Robbery Is in Fact a Naive and Cute Gal From My Class

altTitles.id: Karyawati yang Terisak-sedu yang Kutolong dari Perampok Toserba adalah Seorang Gadis Naif nan Imut dari Kelasku

description.en:
_"Will you stay over at my house starting today?"_ 

Riku Kuromine, a second-year high school student, became despondent after being rejected by his childhood friend. He happens to enter a convenience store and saves a clerk who was being attacked by a robber. The clerk turns out to be Ayana Hoshimiya, the most popular and beautiful gal in school. As a result of this incident, Ayana asks Riku to protect her from a stalker and they start living together under the guise of him protecting her as she lives alone.
description.ja:
**見た目は派手ギャル、中身は超絶うぶ!? “うぶかわ”ギャル×非リア、禁断の同棲ラブコメ!!**

「今日から、あたしの家に……泊まる？」高校二年生の黒峰リクは、幼馴染に振られて自暴自棄になったところ、偶然入ったコンビニで強盗に襲われていた店員を助ける。その店員は学校でいちばんモテる美人ギャル・星宮彩奈だった。この件をきっかけに星宮からストーカー被害を相談され、一人暮らしの彼女を守る名目でふたりは同棲することになり――!?
description.pt-br:
“Você gostaria de ficar em minha casa esta noite?”
Riku Kuromine, um aluno do segundo ano do ensino médio, ficou triste depois de ser rejeitado por sua amiga de infância. Por coincidência, ele entra em uma loja de conveniência e salva uma funcionária que estava sendo roubada. A funcionária era na verdade Ayana Hoshimiya, a garota mais popular e atraente da escola. Como resultado desse incidente, Ayana pede a Riku para passar a noite em sua casa e protegê-la de um perseguidor.

title.en: The Duchess of the Glass House

altTitles.ja: ガラスの温室の公爵夫人

altTitles.th: ดัชเชสแห่งเรือนกระจก

altTitles.fr: La Duchesse de la serre en verre

description.en:
Reina was born in a highly noble family and became the wife of Duke Heathville. However, rather than happiness, she ultimately died miserably, her husband despised her and even her child was taken away from her. Yet, in her final moments, when Reina finally gave up on everything… she was given a second chance.

"This time, I won’t turn a blind eye to whatever I see!"

Reina summoned her courage and began to live her second life.

"Edhart, I know everything now, and I hate you."

Reina realizes now how ignorant she had been in the past.

“I’m going to divorce you.”

Even the husband that she once loved.

“Alright.”

Her husband, who she thought had despised her, was crying.

---
Rayna Vinosht was always known as the cursed one. Unloved by her father, she’s married off to the handsome Duke Edgar Heathvilian, but he soon becomes cold to her, taking away her son, and giving him to the seductive Monica Espert. But Rayna has a second chance at life thanks to Ondine, an adorable water spirit, who forms a contract with her. Soon Rayna has supernatural powers and the confidence to rule over her estate like a strong duchess, but what will happen now that Edgar is falling in love with her?

---

description.fr:
Reina est née d'une lignée de haute noblesse et est devenue la femme du Duc Heathbillian. Cependant, elle fit face à une mort misérable en plus de la méprisance de son mari et du fait que son fils lui fut enlevé. Quand Reina finit par tout abandonner, il lui fut donné une seconde chance. 

«Cette fois, je ne fermerai pas les yeux sur ce qu'il se passe!»

Elle rassemble son courage et commence sa seconde vie.

«Edhart, à présent, je sais tout et je te hais.»

Elle réalise à quel point elle était ignorante dans le passé.

«Je veux divorcer.»

Même concernant son mari, qu'elle aimait.

«Bien.»

Reina pensait que son mari la méprisait; pourtant, c'était des larmes qui coulaient sur son visage.

---

title.en: Gendai no Saikyou Heishi, Isekai Dungeon o Kouryaku Suru

altTitles.ja: 現代の最強兵士、異世界ダンジョンを攻略する

altTitles.en: The Modern Era's Strongest Soldier Conquers Another World's Dungeon

description.en: Hasumi Ryuuji, the man called “the modern era’s strongest soldier”, someone who can make numerous difficult strategies a success, was transferred during a mission into the depths of another world’s dungeon. A “heavenly voice” echoed inside his brain guiding him — “Welcome, the hero from another world” — as he encounters a scene in which adventurers are being attacked by monsters. However, making good use of his superior physical abilities, discernment, and hand-to-hand combat abilities, he succeeds in easily making quick work of the monsters. In this other world, where adventurers are existences weaker than monsters, Hasumi, who can suppress his target even with just a knife, was someone regarded as a hero due to his outstanding abilities. Hasumi decides to cooperate with the adventurers he rescued, but they are attacked by a dragon, falling into a critical situation. Nevertheless, he leads his flustered comrades, coordinate them and makes an attack opportunity to appear. Moreover, after he summons modern firearms with a “weapon summoning” item, he kills the dragon in one shot by accurately targeting its weak spot. In front of this man’s tempered body and intellect, someone who is asked “Who the heck are you?” answers “I’m just a soldier”, even the mythical-grade dungeon is not a threat?! The curtain rises for the story of an ex-special forces soldier turned adventurer challenging another world!

altTitles.ja: 不思議のまゆりさん

description.en:
Yuusuke, a 7th grader, is interested in his friend's older sister for various reasons.
The older sister, while a little strange, is a kind and caring girl.
She's mysterious but is popular with everyone.  
This is an ordinary comedy about Mayuri-san's mysterious everyday life.

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.ja: 黄泉のツガイ

altTitles.fr: Tsugai : Daemons of the Shadow Realm (Kurokawa)

description.en: The manga centers on Yuru, a boy who lives in a remote mountain village, spending his time hunting birds and being one with nature. But one day, Yuru's younger twin sister Asa is called to serve in the jail at the heart of the village, her duty also confining her there. Yuru slowly unravels the unnatural mystery hidden beneath his quiet village.
description.ru: Сюжет расскажет о мальчике Юру из далекой горной деревни, который проводит свое время в единении с природой, охотясь за птицами. Но однажды его сестру-близнеца Асу призвали служить в тюрьме, находящейся в центре деревни. После этого Юру постепенно разгадывает тайну, скрытую в его тихой деревне...
description.pt-br: A trama acompanha Yuru, um jovem que vive em uma aldeia remota na montanha, onde vive da caça e se conecta com a natureza. Após Asa, sua irmã gêmea, ser chamada para servir na prisão da vila, Yuru começa a desvendar um mistério sobrenatural que envolve sua aldeia.

description.en:
Within the winding streets of Kyoto's geisha district lives a 16 year old girl named Kiyo. 
After failing to become a Maiko, a traditional dance apprentice, she starts working as caterer for her troupe. 
This is the story of her daily life.  

Published in Indonesian by Elex Media as **Juru Masak Para Maiko**.

Anime: [AniDB](https://anidb.net/anime/15476) | [MAL](https://myanimelist.net/anime/41556/Maiko-san_Chi_no_Makanai-san) | [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=23951) | [LC](https://www.livechart.me/anime/9863) | [IMDB](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt13884016/)
Live-action dorama: [Netflix](https://www.netflix.com/title/81325501) | [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/718203-kiyo-in-kyoto) | [IMDB](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt15964848/)
 
--- 
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen Manga**
description.ja: ここは京都のど真ん中にある花街。 舞妓さんたちが深夜、お仕事を終えたあと帰ってきて、共同生活を送っているのは、「屋形」と呼ばれるおうちです。 とある屋形で「まかないさん」として舞妓さんたちに毎日の食事を作っているのは、なんと弱冠16歳の少女・キヨ。 彼女がまかないさんになったのには、ある意外な理由があって——。 華やかな花街の舞台裏、普通の日のごはんを通して、温かな人間模様が描かれます。

altTitles.ja: ちりぢりゆくの

description.en:
Kuno Shio, who is half human and half alien, has a "glitch" that causes his body to turn into a gel-like mass when he gets lustful.
He enjoys attracting girls who gather because of his novelty, but one day, his parents are worried about Shio, who is only interested in splattering, and transfer him to a boarding school for boys.
At the moment when Souma Minato, the class representative who was assigned to take care of Shio, hugs him, Shio somehow splatters...!?
The popular pure love comedy for youth, which was popular on LINE manga, is now a full-color comic with original illustrations!!
Hyeun is a genius dancer but has stage fright, and Suhyun is a beginner dancer but is not afraid of the stage. This is the Street Dance growth story of two different dancers!
description.ko:
천재 댄서이지만 무대 공포증을 지닌 혜은과,
초보 댄서이지만 무대를 두려워하지 않는 수현.
서로 다른 두 댄서의 스트릿 댄스 성장기!

title.en: Onna Tomodachi wa Tanomeba Igaito Yarasete Kureru

altTitles.en: My Female Friends Are Surprisingly Willing to Let Me Do It If I Ask For It

altTitles.ja: 女友達は頼めば意外とヤらせてくれる

altTitles.pt-br: Surpreendentemente, minhas amigas estão dispostas a me deixar fazer isso se eu pedir

description.en: Hisaya Minato, a normal high school student, has a female friend who is a bit peculiar. She is Aoi Hatsuki, the most beautiful girl in the high school. For some reason, they get along very well, and since they happen to live on the same floor, they gradually become good friends, coming and going from each other's houses. One day, Minato suddenly asks her to show him her panties. At first, Hatsuki is reluctant, but then she starts to roll up her skirt?
description.ja:
平凡な高校生・湊寿也には可愛すぎる女友達がいる。それは美少女ギャルの葉月葵。何故か気が合う二人は、偶然同じマンションに住んでいることもあって、お互いの家に入り浸るほど仲良くなっていく。そんなある日、湊は勢いで「パンツを見せてほしい」とお願いしてしまう。初めは渋る葉月だったが、恥じらいつつスカートをめくり始めて――！？
 
--- 
 
Heibon'na kōkōsei Minato hisaya ni wa sukoshi kawatta tomodachi ga ita. Sore wa gakkō ichi no bishōjo Hadzuki Aoi. Nazeka kigaau futari wa, gūzen onaji manshon ni sunde iru koto mo ari, jojoni tagai no ie o yukikisuru nakanoii "tomodachi" ni. Son'na aru Ni~Tsu, minato wa ikioi de "pantsu o misete hoshī" to onegai shite shimau. Hajime wa shiburu hadzukidattaga, mizukara sukāto o mekuri hajimete iki ――!?
description.pt-br: Hisaya Minato, um simples estudante do ensino médio, tem uma amiga um tanto peculiar. Aoi Hatsuki, a garota mais linda do ensino médio, por alguma razão, eles se dão muito bem, e por morarem no mesmo andar, gradualmente se tornaram melhores amigos, indo e vindo da casa um do outro. Um dia, Minato de repente pede que ela mostre sua calcinha para ele. De cara, Hatsuki fica relutante, mas então ela começa a levantar sua saia?

description.en: Yukimura Shinya and Himuro Ayame are two scientists that want to find out if love can be solved by a scientific theory. These two scientists also have feelings for each other and want to be able to solve their true feelings through similar theoretical facts. With this perfect opportunity, these scientists will attempt to solve the theory of the love they express for each other.

Make Hiroin ga Oosugiru! @comic

altTitles.vi: Có Quá Nhiều Nữ Chính Thua Cuộc! @comic

altTitles.ja: マケイン

altTitles.ja-ro: Makeine

description.en:
***“Huh? Who are you calling losing?”***

As the background of the class, I, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, witnessed a popular girl–Anna Yanami, getting rejected by another guy.

_“Even though he said we’ll get married. Don’t you think he’s pretty mean?”
“When did he say that?”
“When we were 4 or 5 years old.”_

That doesn’t count, right? With this, the losing heroines like Remon Yakishio from the Track and Field Club, and Chika Komari, from the literature club.

_“Nukumizu-kun. There are two types of girls. Childhood friends or cheating cats.”
“I see. Well, that’s a bold statement.”_

There’s a fortune for those who shine only after losing. Losing Heroines—The curtain to the mysterious coming-of-age story “Makeine” opens now!
  
---

**Links:**  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/books/09453017)
- [Alternative Raw](https://shogakukan-comic.jp/book-series?cd=51545)
description.ja:
クラスの背景モブ高校生こと温水和彦は、男子に人気のクラスメート・八奈見杏菜が幼馴染にフラれるのを目撃してしまう。
仕方なく八奈見を慰める温水だが、それをきっかけに、様々な負け感あふれる女子たちに絡まれることになり――!?
負けヒロイン――マケインたちと辿る謎の青春が、ここに幕を開ける！
負けてこそ輝く彼女たちに、幸いあれ。
description.vi:
“Hử? Cậu gọi ai là đồ thua cuộc cơ?”

Tôi, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, một nhân vật làm nền trong lớp, chứng kiến cảnh cô nàng nổi tiếng – Anna Yanami bị một nam sinh khác từ chối.

“Dù cho cậu ấy đã từng nói bọn mình sẽ kết hôn đấy. Cậu có thấy cậu ấy quá đáng không?”

“Cậu ấy nói thế vào lúc nào vậy?”

“Hồi bọn tớ 4 hay 5 tuổi gì đó.”

Thế thì đâu có tính?

Cùng với cô nàng còn có những nữ chính thua cuộc khác như Remon Yakishio của Câu lạc bộ Điền kinh và Komari Chika từ Câu lạc bộ Văn học.

“Nukumizu-kun nè, trên đời có hai loại con gái. Một là bạn thuở nhỏ, còn lại là đồ đàn bà giựt bồ.”

“Vậy hả. Chà, một tuyên bố đầy táo bạo ha.”

Có một loại vận mệnh rằng có những người chỉ thực sự toả sáng sau khi đã thua cuộc.

Những nữ chính thua cuộc—Bức màn câu chuyện tuổi mới lớn mang tên “Makein” sẽ lật mở ngay bây giờ!
description.es-la: "¿Eh? ¿A quién llamas perdedor?" Como fondo de la clase, yo, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, fui testigo de cómo una chica popular -Anna Yanami- era rechazada por otro chico. "Aunque dijo que nos casaríamos. ¿No crees que es bastante malo?" "¿Cuándo dijo eso?" "Cuando teníamos 4 o 5 años". Eso no cuenta, ¿verdad? Con esto, las heroínas perdedoras como Remon Yakishio del Club de Atletismo, y Chika Komari, del club de literatura. "Nukumizu-kun. Hay dos tipos de chicas. Las amigas de la infancia o las gatas tramposas". "Ya veo. Bueno, esa es una declaración audaz". Hay una fortuna para los que brillan sólo después de perder. ¡Heroínas perdedoras-El telón de la misteriosa historia de madurez "Makeine" se abre ahora! ["Makeine" es la abreviación del nombre del manga]
description.pt-br:
"Hã? Quem você está chamando de perdedor?

Como pano de fundo da aula, eu, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, testemunhei uma garota popular, Anna Yanami, sendo rejeitada por outro cara.

“Mesmo que ele tenha dito que vamos nos casar. Você não acha que ele é muito mau?
"Quando ele disse isso?"
“Quando tínhamos 4 ou 5 anos.”

Isso não conta, certo? Com isso, perdem heroínas como Remon Yakishio, do Clube de Atletismo, e Chika Komari, do clube de literatura.

“Nukumizu-kun. Existem dois tipos de garotas. Amigos de infância ou gatos traidores.”
"Eu vejo. Bem, essa é uma afirmação ousada.”

Há fortuna para quem só brilha depois de perder. Perdendo Heroínas – A cortina para a misteriosa história de maioridade “Makeine” abre agora!

description.en:
Tartaros: A mysterious and massive underground dungeon. There, adventurers are engaged in a night and day struggle to find the treasure they seek. Lavi the New Adventurer is taking on the challenge of Tartaros, but has a problem. A renowned dark merchant, Philo the Beastkin, is pestering him to buy her strange items! She pushes items (often erotic) onto Lavi for him to use in every situation they come across. 

What will become of Lavi’s adventures?! Is he willing to buy anything from this adorably annoying merchant girl?!   

This is a fantasy comic with a teasing merchant!!
description.es:
el Misterioso laberinto subterráneo gigante "Tartaros".   
  
Allí, los aventureros de día y de noche se aventuran en  
buscan tesoros y otras riquezas. El aventurero novato Lavi (shota) que desafió el calabozo "tartaros" y que para su mala suerte se mete en algunos problemas, Es en ese instante cuando conoció a la mitad bestia Philo (ponkotsu), con quien hace un trato para ser su cliente habitual.  
¿Qué pasará con la aventura de Lavi? ¡seguirá Comprándole ítem   
a esta belleza y hermosa!  
  
¡¡¡la comedia de fantasía sobre el aventurero novato Lavi (shota)   
y la comerciante mitad bestia Philo (ponkotsu)!!

Two people who met for the first time today. Should we have the "world's best wedding" 3 years later…!?  
The Nanami High School that Ui enters is a special school where girls and boys spend their dorm life in a shared room, aiming for the world's best wedding! Kon, the guy chosen as Ui's partner by the super accurate matching system, is an ever so slightly malicious guy…!?

My childhood friend, who's sensitive to cold, is such a pain! He gets close to me every chance he gets to feel my body heat! He has no sense of personal space!

Yuki, who's fed up with being in the same school as Sabu, rejects him ruthlessly and brilliantly, sometimes with physical force and sometimes with words of disdain.

We have the kind-hearted, beautiful, strong girl and the super sensitive-to-cold, disappointingly good-looking guy. This is an exciting and surreal school life romcom!

description.en:
After her parents are killed by bandits, young Sarasa Feed is sent to an orphanage where she learns about the prestigious world of alchemy. Determined to follow in her late parents' footsteps and become an independent business owner, she enrolls at the Royal Alchemist Academy to train and get certified as an official alchemist.

Five years later, Sarasa graduates from the institution and nearly achieves her dream before realizing that she lacks the funds to do so. Left with little choice, she makes do with a low-priced storefront in a town situated far away from the bustling capital. Despite the threat of treacherous terrain and dangerous monsters in the remote countryside, Sarasa begins her exciting new life as an alchemist.
description.ja:
錬金術師のお店始めました！

王立錬金術師養成学校を卒業したサラサは
師匠から一軒のお店をプレゼントされる。
気前の良い師匠に見送られ、錬金術師として
ちょっぴり優雅な生活を夢見て旅立ったものの
肝心のお店は廃屋同然の見た目で──。

可愛いアルバイトや優しい村の人に囲まれて、
ちょっぴり不便やトラブルはあるものの
悠々自適なお仕事スローライフここに開店！
description.pt-br:
Sonhe alto! Eu vou ser o alquimista número um do país!
Quando a jovem Sarasa se formou na Royal Alchemist Academy, seu professor presenteou-a com uma casa para ela montar uma loja. Com o objetivo de se tornar uma alquimista masterclass, ela mesma reúne materiais, experimenta e opera um negócio. Em seu próprio atelier, Sarasa se entrega a uma vida alquimista lenta e descontraída!

description.de:
Nach einem Leben voller Blutvergießen und Kummer wird die große Kaiserin Martina wiedergeboren als Astina, geniale Tochter eines bescheidenen Grafen. Aber ihre friedliche Welt zerbricht, als der Bankrott der Familie ihren Vater dazu zwingt, sie an den gefährlichen Erzherzog Atalenta zu verheiraten. Dieser ist in der feinen Gesellschaft bekannt als „Terriod die Bestie“, weil er durch einen Familienfluch in ein wildes Monster verwandelt wurde. Glücklicherweise ist selbst die tödliche Bestie von Atalenta dem mächtigen Schwert der ehemaligen Kaiserin nicht gewachsen. Alle sind geschockt, als die neue Erzherzogin ihren Ehemann kurzerhand zähmt und zum Familienoberhaupt wird. Niemand ist jedoch mehr überrascht als Astina selbst, als ein einfacher Kuss Terriod zurück in einen Menschen verwandelt. Er ähnelt nicht nur ihrem Liebhaber aus ihrem vergangenen Leben, sondern hat auch noch keinerlei Erinnerungen an sie von seiner Zeit als Bestie. Kann sich dieses mächtige Paar trotz der unangenehmen Umstände zusammentun und über das Erzherzogtum herrschen?

---

description.en:
100 years after her death, Empress Martina, the founder of the Carabella Empire, reincarnates as Astina Lette, the daughter of a count. Her peaceful, everyday life as a noble lady, a stark contrast to her past life, is short-lived, however.

With the bankruptcy of her father's failed trade business, her family falls into great debt. Astina decides to sell herself off to marry Grand Duke Thereode in place of her sister Kanna to save her family from their financial crisis. But Thereode is forever cursed to take on the form of a beast, and no one expects her to survive the night with him…

Still, defying all odds, she fights the beast with her impressive swordsmanship, and miraculously survives. Over time, a slow relationship begins to kindle between them as she tames him as her pet.

---
Following a life of bloodshed and heartbreak, the great Empress Martina is reborn as Astina, the genius daughter of a humble count. But her peaceful world is shattered when bankruptcy forces her father to marry her off to the dangerous Archduke Atalenta. All of high society knows him as "Theriod the Beast" because of a family curse that turned him into a wild monster. Luckily, even the deadly beast of Atalenta is no match for the former empress's mighty sword. 

Everyone is shocked when the new archduchess tames her husband all too easily and takes over as the family head. No one's more surprised than Astina, however, when her casual kiss returns Theriod to his human form. Not only does he resemble her past life lover, but he has no memory of her from his wolf days. Despite these awkward circumstances, can the new power couple join hands to rule over the archduchy?

---

description.fr:
Après une vie ponctuée de massacres et de trahisons, l'impératrice Martina se réincarne dans le corps d'Astina, de longues années plus tard. Seulement, cette fois aussi, sa vie ne sera pas de tout repos, puisqu'après que leur père a fait faillite, la sœur d'Astina est mariée de force à l'archiduc Atalenta, un homme victime d'une terrible malédiction le transformant en monstre. Astina décide alors de prendre la place de la jeune Kanna, et affronte sans mal la bête terrifiante qu'est devenu l'archiduc. Elle n'en reste pas moins surprise d'arriver à gérer la situation avec tant de facilité, et l'est encore plus lorsqu'un simple baiser de sa part finit par rendre son apparence à l'archiduc, qui en plus de ressembler étrangement à l'homme donc Martina était amoureuse, n'a plus aucun souvenir d'elle lorsqu'il était un loup. Malgré cette situation on ne peut plus étrange, vont-ils réussir à maintenir l'ordre dans le duché et à régner main dans la main?

---

description.ko:
제국의 시조였던 전설적인 인물 마티나의 죽음으로부터 백 년 후,
마티나는 귀족가의 일개 여식인 아스티나로 환생한다.

전생과 다른 평화로운 일상은 잠시,
아버지의 파산으로 인해 아스티나는
야수의 형상을 한 테리오드 대공에게로 팔려 간다.

“급소를 쳐서 기절시켰어요.”
“기…… 절시키셨다고요?”

하룻밤에 죽어 나갈 것이라는 모두의 예상과 달리
그녀는 화려한 검술로 괴물 테리오드를 제압해
애완동물로 길들이기 시작한다.

“테오, 앉아.”
“컹!”

달빛이 아름다운 어느 밤,
자신을 잘 따르는 테리오드가 기특해
아스티나는 그에게 짧게 입을 맞춰 주는데……

“……테오?”

아스티나의 애완동물이……
사람이 됐다?

결핍된 괴물 남편과 무심한 아내의 본격 조련 로맨스!

---

description.ru:
Спустя сотню лет после смерти Мартины — основательницы империи, легенда переродилась в теле Астины — одной из дочерей аристократической семьи. Ее мирная повседневная жизнь, так отличавшаяся от предыдущей, оборвалась в тот миг, когда обанкротившийся отец продал ее звероподобному эрцгерцогу Териоту. Но вопреки многочисленным ожиданиям, что девушка, встретившись с чудовищем, в одночасье погибнет, благодаря своему исключительному мастерству владения мечом Астина победила монстра и приручила его, словно домашнего питомца…

---

description.uk:
Через 100 років після смерті, імператриця Мартіна, засновниця імперії Карабелла, перевтілюється в Астіну Летте, дочку графа. Однак її мирне повсякденне життя благородної дами, що різко контрастує з її минулим життям, є недовгим.

Після банкрутства невдалого торгового бізнесу її батька, її родина потрапляє у великі борги. Астіна вирішує продати себе, щоб вийти заміж за великого герцога Тереоду, замість своєї сестри Канни, щоб врятувати свою сім'ю від фінансової кризи. Але Тереода назавжди проклятий мати образ звіра, і ніхто не очікує, що вона переживе ніч з ним...

---

description.en: What happens when a classmate finds out about another girl's secret yuri obsession/feelings? A yuri comedy ensues!

altTitles.en: I’m a High School Boy, but I Got Gender-Swapped Into a Gyaru

altTitles.ja-ro: Danshi Koukousei Dakedo Gal ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.pt-br: Eu sou um Garoto do Ensino médio, mas troquei de Gênero e Me Tornei uma Gal

description.en:
Shunpei, a loner high schooler, became a gyaru after saving the god of gyaru from drowning. Through his mother's connections, he was able to transfer to an all-girls school, but it was stuffed to the brim with gyarus! 
Every day is a sensory overload for Shunpei, who's never even talked to a girl, let alone a gyaru.

It's the beginning of an introverted high school guy => gender-swapped gyaru comedy!

---
- [Alternative Official Raw (NicoNico)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67976)
description.ja:
陰キャ男子・桜井は、目の前で溺れていたギャル神様を助けた恩恵でギャルになってしまった。
母親の伝手で転校することができたが、その学校はギャルだらけの女子校だった！
ギャルどころか女子とまともに交流したことがない桜井にとって刺激が強すぎる毎日…。
陰キャ男子高校生⇒ギャルTSコメディ開幕！！
description.pt-br:
Shunpei, um estudante solitário do ensino médio, se tornou uma gal depois de salvar a deusa das gals de se afogar. Através das conexões de sua mãe, ele conseguiu transferir-se para uma escola só para meninas, mas estava cheia de gals!
 Todos os dias são uma sobrecarga sensorial para Shunpei, que nunca falou com uma garota, muito menos com uma gal.
 
 É o início de uma comédia escolar engraçada, com um cara introvertido do ensino médio => transformado em Gal.

altTitles.ja: 夜嵐にわらう

description.en: Class 2-C is a rough place. The students abuse their homeroom teacher, Miss Ogino, and made doing so their favorite pastime activity. Even in her hopelessness, Miss Ogino has a routine: She writes letters to the students who are not attending school. In them, she writes that her class is wonderful and full of hope. Only in these letters could Miss Ogino be an “ideal teacher”. One day though, Yoarashi, a student to which Miss Ogino was sending letters, showed up at school. She tells Ogino that she is worried that her lie will be exposed. This is where their "education" began.
description.ja:
とある田舎の公立高校、河鹿原高校。2年C組は荒れていた。
生徒達は担任教師である荻野を迫害し、それを最大の娯楽としていた。
日々絶望する荻野だが、彼女には日課があった。
それは不登校の生徒に手紙を書くこと。
自身のクラスが希望に満ちた素敵なクラスだと自身の理想を手紙にぶつけること。
そのときだけ彼女は“素敵な教師”でいられるのだった。
そんなある日、手紙を出していた不登校生・夜嵐が学校に現れた。
嘘がばれることを焦る荻野に彼女は言う。
『私、先生を助けに来たの』
ここから彼女達の“教育”が始まった──。
description.ru: Огино — учительница, над которой каждый день издеваются собственные ученики. Огино каждый день писала письма одной ученице Ёараси, что никогда не приходила в школу. В этих письмах она представляла себя идеальным учителем. Однако Ёараси, пришедшая в школу, знает, что письма Огино были ложью, поэтому она пришла, чтобы помочь. Самым жестоким способом. Сможет ли Огино убедить Ёараси, что в репрессиях нет необходимости?
description.es-la:
Ogino, es una profesora que está siendo acosada por los estudiantes de su clase.
Ogino fue una maestra ideal en las cartas a Yoarashi, un estudiante ausente.
Sin embargo, Yoarashi, que vino a la escuela, sabe que las cartas de Ogino eran una mentira, y vino a ayudar a Ogino. 
¿Ogino persuadirá a Yoarashi de que no hay necesidad de represalias...?

description.en:
I've long known about your ill intentions!

Huang Yun'er, a D-lister deliberately gets close to female CEO Ou Chenxi, intending to seduce her in order to gain access to the Ou family and investigate her cousin's death. Ou Chenxi sees through Huang Yun'er's scheming, but believing she can fully control the situation and finding Huang Yun'er aesthetically appealing, she doesn't reject this dangerous woman's advances. At the same time, she wants to investigate Huang Yun'er's motives.

One deliberately seduces but wavers due to love amidst her calculations, while the other is irresistibly attracted despite knowing the danger... These two cunning individuals sink together while fully aware, parrying each other's moves while desperately trying to suppress their growing feelings. As they struggle with their emotions, they gradually uncover secrets from the past.

description.ar:
ا عندما يخرج الشرير الحقيقي الوحيد في الرواية أخذ رجلًا جميلًا وتم ترويضه لبقية حياته. بعد أن دفع مخاوفه إلى أقصى حد ، تعلم كيف يتوسل منها ، ليصبح وحشًا لا يمكنه الهروب أبدًا ، حتى لو تم فك رباطه. ومع ذلك ، يقع الوحش في حب المرأة التي تنقذه ، ويصبح الإمبراطور بجانبه ، ويعاقب الشرير بالقيود الأبدية. بعد القصة ، استولت على جسد الشرير في ذلك الوقت عندما كانت في منتصف الطريق لترويض الرجل الرئيسي. ……ماذا علي أن أفعل؟ أولا ، دعونا نتراجع عن غسيل المخ شيئا فشيئا. وبعد ذلك ... دعونا نتظاهر بأننا قد تبنا. "لقد مررت بالكثير من المتاعب في البحث عنك." "أنا ... لا أفهم تمامًا ما تقصده يا جلالة الملك." "كيف أنسى لمستك؟" أمسك بمعصمي ، وأمسك بيدي وحركها برفق على خده - تمامًا مثلما فعلت إليانا ، الشريرة في الرواية ، دائمًا عندما تمدحه. "سأروّضك ، مثلما فعلت - وحشًا لا يمكنه فعل أي شيء بدوني." غطت كفي على خده ثم شفتيه. وضع عليها قبلة قصيرة قبل أن يسحب يدي ببطء

---

description.en:
The only real villain in the novel, took a handsome man and tamed him for the rest of his life. After putting his fear to the limit, he learned to plead with her, becoming a beast from which he could never escape even if he loosened his leash. However, one day, the beast falls in love and becomes emperor with the woman who saved him, and plunges the evil woman into an eternal bondage.

---
I've posessed the body of the sociopathic villainess, Illyana! An evil villainess who picks up a boy named Magnus and raises him however she pleases... that Illyana is me?!

"I am going to tame you into a beast that cannot do anything without me. Just as you had done to me."

And after 2 years, he who had become an emperor began his revenge. Excuse me, author! Illyana was the sinner but why must I suffer his vengeance? I was just a normal reader named Yuna!

---

تنها شرور واقعی رمان، مرد خوش تیپی را گرفت و تا آخر عمر اهلی خودش کرد. بعد از اینکه ترسش را نسبت به خودش زیاد کرد، مرد یاد گرفت که از او التماس کند و تبدیل به حیوانی شد که حتی اگر افسارش را شل کند هرگز نمی توانست از او فرار کند. با این حال، یک روز، حیوان عاشق می شود و با زنی که او را نجات داد، امپراتور می شود و زن شرور را در اسارتی ابدی فرو می برد.

description.fr:
Iliana, la maléfique méchante d'un roman recueille un beau garçon qu'elle dompte comme une bête. À l'aide de drogues et de lavage de cerveau, L'homme laisse peu à peu place à la bête jusqu'à ce que l'héroïne le sauve. La bête deviendra l'empereur du pays et punira la méchante pour l'éternité. C'est une histoire qui aurait pu m'amuser si je n'avais pas été transportée dans le corps de la méchante au beau milieu du roman. Que faire de cette bête rampant à mes pieds? Comment échapper à la terrible fin qui m'attend?

---

description.uk:
Єдина справжня лиходійка у романі взяла красеня і приборкала його назавжди. 
Дійшовши межі та ставши звіром, він навчився благати її. Від сутності його неможливо втекти навіть якщо розірвати повідець. Та це триває тільки доти, поки він не стає імператором, закохується в рятівницю та занурює лиходійку у вічне рабство. 
Я потрапила у ту частину, де головний герой ще не приборканий повністю. 
Що робити? Спочатку приборкати його повністю, а потім покаятись? 
«Це важко забути».
«Що ви маєте на увазі… Я не знаю, Ваша Величносте Імператор».
«Як я можу забути цей твій дотик?»
Він схопив мене за руку, підніс її до щоки й обережно потерся.
Так само, як завжди робила лиходійка у романі, коли хвалила його.
«Я приборкаю тебе. Як ти зробила зі мною, звіром, який без тебе нічого не може зробити».
Долоня, що так ненавмисно торкнулася його щоки, досягла губ. Він коротко поцілував долоню, потім повільно прибрав руку...
